mapper.insert: insert into register (nid, username, phoneNumber, password, name, emailAddress, role) values (#{nid}, #{username}, #{phoneNumber}, #{password}, #{name}, #{emailAddress}, #{role})
mapper.delete: delete from register where nid = #{userContent} or userID = #{userContent}
mapper.update: update register set nid = #{nid}, name = #{name}, password = #{password}, phoneNumber = #{phoneNumber}, role = #{role}, emailAddress = #{emailAddress} where username = #{username}
mapper.select: select password from register where nid = #{nid}
mapper.insert: insert into keyinfo (addrGenIP, ideakey, timehash) values (#{addrGenIP}, #{ideaKey}, #{timeHash})
mapper.select: select ideakey from keyinfo where addrGenIP = #{addrGenIP} and timehash = #{timeHash}
mapper.insert: insert into aidinfo (aidnth, prefix, aid, nid) values (#{aidnth}, #{prefix}, #{aid}, #{nid})
mapper.select: select prefix from aidinfo where aidnth = #{aidnth}
select aidnth from aidinfo where aid = #{aid}
select aid from aidinfo where nid = #{nid}
